cardinal number|(n)|số đếm|Ví dụ:|My little brother likes studying cardinal number.
ordinal number|(n)|số thứ tự|Ví dụ:|1st, 2nd both are ordinal numbers.
decimal|(adj)|thập phân|Ví dụ:|0.6 is a decimal number.
fraction|(n)|phân số|Ví dụ:|¼|is the fraction.
percentage|(n)|tỷ lệ phần trăm|Ví dụ:|The figure is expressed as a percentage.
arithmetic|(n)|số học|Ví dụ:|Today I will learn a lesson of arithmetic.
divide|(v)|chia|Ví dụ:|30 divided by 6 is 5
plus|(prep)|cộng|Ví dụ:|Two plus five is seven.
minus|(prep)|trừ|Ví dụ:|Seven minus three equals four.
multiply|(v)|nhân|Ví dụ:|2 multiplied by 4 is 8.
equal|(adj)|ngang, bằng, như nhau|Ví dụ:|There is an equal number of boys and girls in the class.
total|(n)|tổng cộng|Ví dụ:|The total was $680.
dozen|(n)|tá|Ví dụ:|Give me a dozen of eggs, please.
around|(prep)|khoảng|Ví dụ:|10 divided to 3 is around 3.3.
zero|(no.)|số không|Ví dụ:|Three, two, one, zero… Time's up!
hundred|(n)|một trăm|Ví dụ:|That dress costs hundreds of pounds.
thousand|(un-define)|một nghìn, một ngàn|Ví dụ:|Visitors can expect to pay about a thousand pounds a day.
million|(no.)|một triệu|Ví dụ:|The city has a population of almost one million.
billion|(no.)|một tỷ|Ví dụ:|Worldwide sales reached $2.5 billion.
half|(n)|một nửa|Ví dụ:|It tooks me half an hour to go to work.
